# Publications

Academic publications related to PyGraft and PyGraft-gen.

---

 :trophy: [**Best Resource Paper Award at ESWC 2024**](https://2024.eswc-conferences.org/awards/){target="_blank" rel="noopener"}
> [**PyGraft: Configurable Generation of Synthetic Schemas and Knowledge Graphs at Your Fingertips**](https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-031-60635-9_1){target="_blank" rel="noopener"}  
> Nicolas Hubert, Pierre Monnin, Mathieu d'Aquin, Armelle Brun, Davy Monticolo  
> *ESWC 2024 - 21st International Conference on the Semantic Web*
